content: 2 stsc double_crochet 2 into the half_double_crochet space cluster chain 2 cluster into the next chain 2 space corner repeat 3 times back in the first half_double_crochet space cluster half_double_crochet into the stsc 24 sts / 8 clusters rounds 3+ place 1 cluster in every side space & cluster chain 2 cluster in every corner chain 2 or half_double_crochet space 10 rounds = mini 15 rounds = midi 20 rounds = maxi straps turn skip half_double_crochet stsc double_crochet 5 / 8 / 11 chain 45 / 60 / 75 double_crochet into the last 6 / 9 / 12 sts 12 / 18 / 24 sts turn double_crochet across 57 / 78 / 99 sts mini chain 1 to fo cut the yarn midi turn single_crochet across 78 sts maxi turn double_crochet across 99 sts make another identical panel chain 1 keep yarn attached joining align both panels with the right sides facing outwards crochet through both panels at the same time down the strap place 1 single_crochet into the side of the single_crochet row for midi and 2 single_crochet into the side of every double_crochet row the 1st junction place 1 single_crochet into the nearest top corner space of the granny square around the square place 1 single_crochet into every matching stitch pair through all 4 loops and every chain bottom corners the 2nd junction place 1 single_crochet into the last top corner space of the granny square up the strap place 2 single_crochet into the side of every double_crochet row and 1 single_crochet into the side of the single_crochet row for midi 104 / 151 / 198 sts fo weave in the ends done thank you for choosing the evergranny tote bag crochet pattern if you end up posting your makes please tag me i d love to see it 🙂 kami @kami_crochet_x instagram profile kami crochet kami crochet on tiktok
